pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.11: The text reads _aṭṭhaṅgula […] sugataṅgulena_, ‘eight finger-breadths of the standard finger-breadth.’ 40 centimeters is based on my calculation of the _sugataṅgula_, “the standard fingerbreadth”, as 5 cm. For further explanation, see comment at _bhikkhu-saṅghādisesa_ 6.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.4: See _pācittiya_ 14, {MS.2.387}, for further explanations of these terms.
